headline: Baxter International (BAX): Evaluating Value Potential After Steep Share Declines
summary: Baxter International (BAX) shares have seen modest moves lately, catching the eye of investors interested in value after a challenging year for the stock. Recent returns suggest a mixed sentiment. This creates an interesting setup for those watching healthcare names. See our latest analysis for Baxter International.
